name: Cthulhu's Dungeon
description:
You are a (former) priest of Cthulhu that has angered him. Now you are cursed to run the halls of his dungeon forever. A game for weekly jam #182 and the first of my weekly games for 2021. 

Controls 

Up Arrow - Move up a level 

Down Arrow - Move down a level

Music: Halloween By dAmbient
